Package com.clarkparsia.common.io

Class Summary
ByteStreams2 Utility class to hold functionality not already contained in ByteStreams
DataInputToInputStreamAdapter Adapter to treat a DataInput as an InputStream.
EncryptedFile A extended File which will return an input or output stream for reading and writing to the file in an encrypted/decrypted manner.
Files2 Collection of utility functions for file-centric operations.
ForwardingDataInput Base class for creating a DataInput decorator
ForwardingDataOutput Base class for creating DataOutput decorators.
IOSuppliers Utility class for creating Guava InputSupplier and OutputSupplier objects.
PeekingDataInputStream A DataInputStream that supports peeking at the next byte in the stream.
PeekingInputStream An InputStream that supports peeking at the next byte in the stream
UncloseableOutputStream A wrapper around the underlying stream that prevents the underlying stream from being closed (if passed to other methods that are not very nice and close your stream).
WritableByteChannelDataOutputAdapter An adapter for a DataOutput to use it as a WritableByteChannel.
